title: HoP 148 - Fantasy Island - Ibn Bajja and Ibn Tufayl

description: Intellect and alienation in Ibn Bājja and Ibn Ṭufayl, author of the philosophical desert island castaway tale “Ḥayy Ibn Yaqẓān.”
